unnormalised: Boro, konnem-i Bharotant ek neurologistaso dixtti poddchea vixim vicharlem, sori? Mhunnllear, tumkam punha punha dukhi poddtta vo tumche angak zhomzhombhi lagta zalear, tumi neurochim konsolt korop bore bhov. Mumboi, Delhi vo Bengllur sarke vhoddlea xharanim tumkam anek vikalp melltolle. AIIMS Delhi, udahoronnak, ekdam bore neurologi vibhag asa. Mhaka aikoleam Dr. Rajesh Kumar thaim khup bore assat mhunn. Punn khoreponnan, Dr. Googlecher adharun svotaak rog nirdharan korunk naka!
normalised: Bore, konneni Bharotan eka neurologistak bhett divnche vixim vicharlem, sô? Thoddeachekodden punna punna dok'hi zatat vô tumchea angamni thodde jhonjhannat, zalelear eka neurologisk zaiti bori bhett divnchi. Mumboi, Delhi vô Banglur osle vhoddlea xheramni tumkam zaitim vatê melltoleo. A-I-I-M-S Delhi, udharonnakhatir, tichêkodden ekdam boro Neurology vibhag asa. Mhaka aikolem Doctor Rajesh Kumar thoim ekdam bore asat. Punn gambhirtayen ghevn, Doctor Google-achea adharan apunnuch chikitza korunk naaka!

unnormalised: Atam, kitem apekxa korchi? Poile konsoltant tumchea med histri vixim, fam histri vixim (neuro issues-ak sombondit, nichit!) ani ek fizikol exam vixim zaitim prosn astole. Te MRI vo EEG sarkheo porikxa divonk sangtat. Ek bore aspotrani MRI brain scanak tumkam Rs. 6000-10000 meren khorch yetlo, tumi khoim votat tachecher adharun. Vaiddok tumkam vokhdam divonk xokta vo fiziyotherapi suchounk xokta.
normalised: Atam, kitem apekxa korunk? Poili bhett sambhavitan tumcho voizuki itihas, kuttmacho itihas (neuro-vishayak lagun, nihxank!) ani eka xorirachi chikitza vixim zaitim prosn asot. Te M-R-I vô E-E-G osle test dita. Eka bore hospitalant M-R-I brain scan korunk tumkam rupiya so hazar te dha hazar porian kharch yetlo, tumi koxi vat chintat tancher asotalem. Doctor vouxhoda dita vô physiotherapy suchoitat.

unnormalised: Migraine sarkhea poristhitinkhatir, tem Amitriptyline 25mg sarkhem kitem-i suru korunk xoktat. Dusrea poristhitinkhatir, upchar bodlacho asta. Tumchea vaiddokanim ugddas dovrunk zai ani imanponnan asa zai. Toxench, dusrem mot gheunchen ekhdam bore bhov.
normalised: Migraine oslea halatinchê khatir, te tumchi Amitriptyline ponchvis milligram osle koxetoryen survat kortole. Dusrea halatinchê khatir, upchar bodlot veta. Fakt tumcho doctorak sôgallem ugddapenan ani sadeponan sangunk yadv thevunk. Tantun, ek dusreachem mot ghevn vachunk sodankai bori wat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, tumchi tabiyat mhotvachi! Mhunnun, ushir korunk naka ani speshiallistak bhett diun yeya. Tumchea xharanim ek boro neurologistaache sod lavun svotaak tanka dakhoiya. Tumkam onlinecher Practo vo Apollo 24/7 sarkhea portalancher uchch vaiddok melltolle. Subecha!
normalised: Nihkalak, tumchem zannvai mhothvachem asta! Tantun dher korunk naaka ani eka vixexagyanak bhett diunk. Tumchea xherant ek boro neurologist sodh ani tumchi chikitza korun ghea. Practo vô Apollo twenty four seven oslea portalscherui tumi uttam doctors online sodhunk xakta. Xubhechha!
